descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the construction Legue! A brand new platform that can take any mod you've downloaded for free and put's adds and paid content all over them.

With the new Construction League, modders can now make the game we wanted to make, but for half the price we'd have to pay an actual studio! We all know that modding adds so much more to our games, patches, extra quests, armor that doesn't look like it came out of an ikea box, and even main quests that aren't lackluster and distracted!

We get it, our fans want more, you are holding us to a higher standard and that's totally fair, but in all honesty the board room meeting really gave us the impression that we didn't want to put much effort into our next game, so we thought...why not let the FANS make the game they've always wanted us to deliver on!

You've given our Public Relations team a lot to think about, and we've thought about it. By delivering all the content of our games like a series of LEGO packets, you can build the best Elder Scrolls experience you've always wanted to believe in; The experience we always believed you could make for yourselves and pay us for. So without further ado, we present to you the Creatio- I mean Construction Legue.

The Construction League,
It's totally not paid mods.


FUTUR PLANS:

Upcoming Version 1.1
-patches
-paid mods
-new PR representatives
-damage control
-reworking lore
-extended universe
-micro transactions
-horse armor
-lunch boxes
-merger with EA
author: Elder Pawns
